text: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبْغِ ۚ فَٱرْتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًا

translation.en.sahih: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints.
translation.id.indonesian: Musa berkata: "Itulah (tempat) yang kita cari". Lalu keduanya kembali, mengikuti jejak mereka semula.
